get.summary: Search for courses, universities, and organizations
Search for Colleges, Courses, and Universities
get.description: This endpoint allows you to perform a simple search across colleges, courses, and universities. You can filter results by keyword, course ID, and university ID. The results are paginated for better performance.

parameters.name: keyword
parameters.description: Keyword to search for across college, course, and university names. It searches both title and short title.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Specify the search type. This field defaults to 'simple' if not provided.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of items per page for paginated results. Defaults to 10.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current page number for pagination. Defaults to 1.

parameters.name: course
parameters.description: Filter by specific course ID to narrow down search results to a particular course.

parameters.name: university
parameters.description: Filter by specific university ID to narrow down search results to a particular university.

post.description: Creates a new education history record for a specific student.

requestBody.description: Updated data for the education history record

404.description: Education history or student not found

message.example: Education history or student not found.

delete.description: Deletes a student education history from the system.
